document_data.caption: ProFantasy Software Ltd.
document_data.name: ProFantasy Software Ltd.
document_data.mainbody: '''ProFantasy Software Ltd.''' is a company that develops mapping software for tabletop role-playing and war games.https://www.profantasy.com/products/default.asp
document_data.History: ProFantasy Software Ltd was founded in 1993 and became an established map-making software company.https://www.profantasy.com/fratlas/features.htm [[Robert Lazzaretti]] was involved in designing the symbols.https://www.profantasy.com/fratlas/cc2symbols.htm Since its release, their atlas received three updates.http://www.wizards.com/dnd/article.asp?x=dnd/ex20020218a The Interactive Atlas product completely sold out, and remains out of print over two decades later.https://www.profantasy.com/fratlas/ordering.htm
document_data.Trivia: * [[Linda Kekumu]], the primary cartographer for the Forgotten Realms Interactive Atlas, became immortalized in the Forgotten Realms campaign setting during her work at ProFantasy Software Ltd. During the third patch of the Interactive Atlas, [[Eric L. Boyd]] named the northernmost island in [[Faer√ªn]] after her reversed surname, [[Umukek]].
